phrases: Oh, Rin-chan, mind if I sit there?
Does not look like we have got sauce.
Hey, Masato, we saw you do it.
You took a bunch of Kengo's cutlet.
Hey, man, it was totally weird.
I was going to stop with one piece, but no matter how much I took, it was still there!
I do not eat that much.
Komari, you got to eat more or you will not get big!
What are you doing, you idiot?!
Do not you feel sorry for Komari?!
She is trying to be nice!
Why do not you give her some of your cutlet, then, huh?!
There would not be enough for me if I did that!
I have got a tournament coming up!
I need all the nutrition I can get!
Do not fight, I do not mind.
You do not need to eat and get any bigger, you
You are giving Komari-chan a hard time!
Where is your magic cutlet now?
Rin-chan used to be so shy.
But she is a bit more outgoing now, thanks to Komari-san.
hitori ga tsurai kara futatsu no te wo tsunaida
It was too hard for one to do, so two of us held hands
hitori ga tsurai kara futatsu no te wo tsunaida
It was too hard for one to do, so two of us held hands
futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida
But two would be too lonely, so we all came together in a circle and held hands
futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida
But two would be too lonely, so we all came together in a circle and held hands
kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari
I am sure that will be strength in itself,
kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari
I am sure that will be strength in itself,
donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda
Enough to end any dream we have
donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda
Enough to end any dream we have
Fly high, high into the sky,
Fly high, high into the sky,
takaku kere takaku koe wo age
Jump high, and raise your voice high,
takaku kere takaku koe wo age
Jump high, and raise your voice high,
itsuka kujiketa sono hi no mukou made
Until you can move on past the day we will have died
itsuka kujiketa sono hi no mukou made
Until you can move on past the day we will have died
kimi no koe wasurenai namida mo wasurenai
I will never forget your voice, and I will never forget your tears
kimi no koe wasurenai namida mo wasurenai
I will never forget your voice, and I will never forget your tears
kore kara hajimaru kibou to iu na no mirai wo
The future, what we call hope, begins now
kore kara hajimaru kibou to iu na no mirai wo
The future, what we call hope, begins now
Those legs will keep on moving forward,
Those legs will keep on moving forward,
Even in the face of the oncoming grief
Even in the face of the oncoming grief
Oh, I got a text from Komari-chan.
So you and Komari-san are texting each other now?
Kyousuke put her number in for me.
But her texts are really long.
Is it some kind of code?
What do you have to do now?
Do the pu p pet show.
Riki, how do you do a puppet show?
Are you going to do it?
I have already completed the other tasks.
They will tell us the secret of the world if I finish the rest!
How many more mysterious letters are we going to get?
Does the sender really plan to tell us the secret of the world?
You totally did it on purpose!
These boys hit the panda with the ball on purpose!
I was using it for a puppet show too.
She said she wanted to see a puppet show for her birthday, so I was going to give her one.
How about you do it, then?
She was really looking forward to it.
I will fix him up and do the puppet show.
Rin wants to complete the task.
Rin-chan, you are doing a puppet show?
Do you know how to do a puppet show?
Ask me anything you would like!
You have done a puppet show before?
I think you need to write a story first.
Then you make puppets to match the story.
I have to write a story?
I am not very good at that.
Let us think of one together!
You wrote all of these, Komari-san?
Once upon a time, there was a penguin.
That is a story about a boy and a girl and eight dwarves.
The boy and girl solve each of the dwarves' worries, one by one.
And once they solve the worries, the dwarves disappear.
They say goodbye to the boy and girl and disappear.
I have not thought of what happens after that.
You will just make things crazy!
Rin-chan's going to do a puppet show!
I like the sound of that.
Actually, I was thinking of doing one too.
Dedicating your youth to baseball is nice and all,
but we should do puppet shows sometimes too!
One day, we will do it at a community center!
For the elderly and the young!
Bringing the community's hearts together as one is one of the goals of the Little Busters!
Oh dang, he makes it sound so good!
No, I do not think so.
It is the first I have heard of this goal.
You are doing a puppet show?
Well, it may be a good way to pass the time.
Japan does have a long history of puppet theatre, starting from the ningyou joururi.
Let us start with a script!
Why do not we see where we go with this?
A strange, wet sound rang through the streets.
It gives it a good atmosphere.
Mine's a story of friendship between an iron dumbbell and a steel dumbbell!
Leave me here and go on.
I was just extra weight for you guys.
That is not true, iron dumbbell!
I was even more extra weight!
We should be traditional and go with a traditional story.
Once upon a time, in a faraway place, an old man and old woman lived together.
The old man went to the woods to gather firewood.
The old woman went to the river
to fight a life and death battle with the tentacles.
I think the story's pretty touching.
A newlywed couple is attacked by an extraterrestrial lifeform.
I have made the cast with what I had on hand.
The story begins in the newlywed couple's home.
The bath is ready, darling, sir!
You will go back to the dorms now.
She promised to do it tomorrow.
I wonder how she is going to.
Riki-kun, I will take care of Rin-chan.
If we are close, we will butt heads!
I brought cookies and seaweed'n salt chips!
What happens in the penguin story?
The penguin works really hard, but nothing works out for him.
The cat and dog and raccoon laugh at him.
But in the end, a star let us the penguin ride him!
He flies through the sky on the star, waving to everyone!
It is perfect for the puppet show!
I will make the penguin, then.
Do you want to make the star?
I am not good at sewing...
When you do not think you can do it, you do some optimism magic!
If you put your heart into each stitch, you will make a happy, sunny place!
You got everything ready in one night!
Need me to help with anything?
Komari-chan did her best to get me here.
I need to do my best alone too.
You are really going to do a puppet show?
It is the start of the story of the hardworking penguin!
And so, the penguin rode the star into the sky and waved down to everyone.
Is not it great that he worked so hard?
Take good care of the penguin, okay?
I need to go tell Komari-chan!
Why did the person who wrote the letter tell her to do the puppet show?
It was as if they knew what was going to happen next.
The letter to save the cafeteria came before the cafeteria needed saving.
A strange feeling welled up inside me.
Even though I had never seen that picture book before, I felt that I had.
The boy and girl solve each of the dwarves' worries, one by one.
And once they solve the worries, the dwarves disappear.
They say goodbye to the boy and girl and disappear.
It is all thanks to you, Komari-chan.
I was wishing on the first star.
Wishing that you would do well.
I have been wearing it for a long time so my wish could come true.
I have two of them, so I can make two wishes!
Okay, this one will be for my wish...
and this one can be for your wish!
I will leave that to you.
I will think of one for you!
If You are Happy, I am Happy, Rin-chan
If You are Happy, I am Happy, Rin-chan
If You are Happy, I am Happy, Rin-chan
The sound of the bell echoing,
The sound of the bell echoing,
Those pieces we shared, one each
Those pieces we shared, one each
I hope tomorrow will be sunny
I hope tomorrow will be sunny
Can we go beyond the stars?
Can we go beyond the stars?
Walking, looking at the sky, a single light
Walking, looking at the sky, a single light
Even alone, on the face of the moon,
Even alone, on the face of the moon,
rasen no hate he kaketeyuku yo
Run right past the end of the circle
rasen no hate he kaketeyuku yo
Run right past the end of the circle
You will be able to smile after you cry,
You will be able to smile after you cry,
I said that because I know you can
I said that because I know you can
bokura no tabi wasuretari shinai yo
You will never forget our journey, even for a moment
bokura no tabi wasuretari shinai yo
You will never forget our journey, even for a moment
I will cast a little magic so you never lose it,
I will cast a little magic so you never lose it,
And I will not say good-bye
And I will not say good-bye
You will start walking again one day
You will start walking again one day
It is finally time for the Little Busters' first game!
What are you going to do?
